input.sentences: i made a cake for the party today .
i also made some other food .
we made a big fire to cook it all with .
it was a lot of fun .
output.sentences: The woman was preparing for the party by cutting the cake.
The woman went outside to grab some food.
There was a fire being used to cook the food.
Then, some friends would arrive to the party.
The day was a lot of fun.
